report.title: Trending people for an event
report.description: Gives a list of top 10 recent contributors, with their number of records. Ideal for populating a 'trends cloud'.
report.query: SELECT *, greatest(11, cast((15 - (sqrt(#records_to_scan#) / sqrt(records)))*2 as integer)) as font_size FROM ( SELECT case position(',' in snf.recorders) when 0 then snf.recorders else regexp_replace(snf.recorders, '(.+), ', '') || ' ' || regexp_replace(snf.recorders, ',(.+)', '') end as recorders, count(id) as records FROM (SELECT o.id, snf.recorders FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on csn.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #records_to_scan#) list GROUP BY snf.recorders ORDER BY count(id) DESC LIMIT #recorders_to_return# ) AS list ORDER BY snf.recorders ASC
